sentences.en: Are you going to give me the macho caveman act?
sentences.cn: 你打算用大男子主义的粗暴方式来对我吗？

sentences.en: The only way boxing can be discussed is in the context of a caveman's sport.
sentences.cn: 拳击只能在原始人的运动这个意义上加以讨论.

words.tran_cn: （史前石器时代的）穴居人；野人

trans.tran_cn: 史前石器时代的穴居人，对妇女残酷，粗鲁的粗野人
trans.tran_en: someone who lived in a  cave  many thousands of years ago
